snippet: Do noise-canceling headphones try to do too much to too many sounds? Audio-Technica would say yes, and is selling its ATH-ANC9 QuietPoint active noise-canceling headphones with three different modes intended to improve noise-canceling in different...
abstract: Do noise-canceling headphones try to do too much to too many sounds? Audio-Technica would say yes, and is selling its ATH-ANC9 QuietPoint active noise-canceling headphones with three different modes intended to improve noise-canceling in different conditions.

headline.main: Headphones That Quiet Trains and Riders -- But Not at the Same Time
headline.print_headline: One Set of Headphones to Filter Out Three Kinds of Noise
